"Find yourself and be that."

Education

Collingwood School has gifted me with not only a solid education but has provided me with skill sets that I will use for the rest of my life. The Four Strands at our school (Academics, Arts, Athletics and Service) I hold responsible for shaping me into the very person I am today. Both the academic and extracurricular opportunities I have enjoyed here have prepared me well to take on challenges that I will face tomorrow.

Ad Verum

AD VERUM Staff Writer for School’s Newspaper. Published general articles on both student life and world headlines.

GVRSF (Grade 9)

Greater Vancouver Regional Science Fair - Received Honorable Mention for science fair presentation entitled, “The Fountain of Filth”

GVRSF (Grade 10)

Greater Vancouver Regional Science Fair - Won GOLD Award for my science poster presentation named, “Rehydrate & Dominate”

Harvard Economics

Model UN 2015 - attended conference in NYC; represented South Africa on the UNODC committee. Drafted a resolution on how to combat organized crime, illicit drug trafficking and terrorism.

Public Speaking

INTERNATIONAL INDEPENDENT SCHOOL PUBLIC SPEAKING COMPETITION in Toronto, October 2015 - was one of three students invited to present in three categories at this International Competition - Won 2nd place in the Finals of Radio Newscast category.
